item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Privacy Policy effective Tue, Apr 07, 2020 The short version I am using Simple Analytics as a way to see some statistics about my blog. However they don’t store or collect any personal data from you. For more information on what Simple Analytics collects (or mostly what they don’t collect) click here. I am not using any tracking cookies nor fingerprinting technology. To host this site, I am using Github Pages.

item.title: Imprint
item.description: Imprint Website Owner and Person responsible for the content according to § 55 RStV Ramon Reschke Paul-Lincke-Straße 18 66113 Saarbrücken E-Mail: hostmaster@eitherway.io Phone: 015678 316796 All the contact information of me given on this website including any photos are explicitly for information purposes or to contact me. They shall not be used for sending advertisements, spam or the like. Should this information nevertheless be used for the above-mentioned purposes, I reserve the right to take legal action.
